tool_description: World Cup 2018 Live Scores API allows to retrieve matches results, scorers, lineups, substitutes, events, statistics, odds and much more all with live updates even with push notifications.
name: World Cup 2018 Live Scores
title: World Cup 2018 Live Scores

api_list.name: Group Table
api_list.description: Returns the table for a group

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Let to compute the table considering only the first half (FH) or the second time (SH) results. Default is full time (FT).

api_list.name: Top scorers
api_list.description: Returns top scorers for the Cup or the number of goals scored by a player

optional_parameters.name: player
optional_parameters.description: Player name

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Team name

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify the first match number to use to compute the result (default 1)

optional_parameters.name: fromdate
optional_parameters.description: Compute the table only with matches played fromdate (forma mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: how
optional_parameters.description: Return only goals scored according the how parameter. Its value can be: left, right, head or any, that is the default.

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to restrict the table compute on home or away games (possible values are home, away or all, that is the default)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page result to return. Default is 1 that are results from 1 to 5 (max. value for page is 20).

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify the last match number to consider to compute the result (default last match number played registered on system)

optional_parameters.name: todate
optional_parameters.description: Compute the table only with matches played todate (format mmddyyyy)

api_list.name: Cup Players
api_list.description: Return all the players for a team. Not available for BASIC plan.

api_list.name: Teams Statistic Table
api_list.description: Teams table for a specified statistic. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: avg
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if you want average statistic value, that is the table computed as (total value statistic/played games). Default false.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Match day number from which to compute the table

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Set with top to get the top 5, with bottom to get the worse 5 teams (default top)

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Team name

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Match day number till which compute the table

api_list.name: Events subscribed
api_list.description: Return all the events subscribed. Not available for BASIC plan.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://heisenbug-world-cup-2018-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/worldcup/push/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heisenbug-world-cup-2018-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://heisenbug-world-cup-2018-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/worldcup/push/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heisenbug-world-cup-2018-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Matches result
api_list.description: Returns all matches for a specified match day number.

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: Group name (only for group stages)

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Returns all match in the date (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns results for playing matches (live) (default false, overwrite others parameters)

optional_parameters.name: team1
optional_parameters.description: Returns all matches with team1 as home team

optional_parameters.name: team2
optional_parameters.description: Returns all matches with team2 as away team

api_list.name: Odd quotas
api_list.description: Returns quotas for an odd a match and a bookmaker. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match

api_list.name: Lineups and substitutes for a match
api_list.description: Returns lineups, substitutes and coaches for a game (only after the game is finished). Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Odds List
api_list.description: Returns the available odds for a match and a bookmaker. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match

api_list.name: Match statistics
api_list.description: Returns statistics for a match. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Missing players for a match
api_list.description: Return all the players who will miss the match and the reason. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match

api_list.name: Bookmakers List
api_list.description: Returns the list of the available bookmakers for a match. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match

api_list.name: Players Statistic Table
api_list.description: Return the players table for a specified statistic. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: player
optional_parameters.description: Player name

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Team name

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Match day number from which compute the table

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Match day number till which compute the table

api_list.name: Player stats for a match
api_list.description: Return the player's statistics for a match. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Match events
api_list.description: Returns all the events for a match. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Match scorers
api_list.description: Returns when and how the scorers scored in a match. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Match day number for the match
